title: Build your path: custom course or AI strategy.
subtitle: Use one page to request a tailored PDF or generate an instant AI-based educational plan. Both keep risk and process at the center – never signals or guarantees.

custom.title: Custom course request
custom.description: Tell us where you are now and what you want to understand. A structured PDF is prepared by a senior trader (via AI) and delivered within 48–96 hours.

markets.label: Markets you want covered
markets.hint: You can pick more than one

style.label: Trading style
style.hint: Main way you want to trade

platforms.label: Platforms / brokers you use (optional)
platforms.placeholder: For example: MT4, MT5, TradingView, Binance...

goals.label: What do you want from this course?
goals.hint: Please be as specific as possible
goals.placeholder: For example: I want to understand risk per trade, basic price structure and have a simple written plan I can follow for the next 3–6 months.

notes.label: Anything else we should know? (optional)
notes.placeholder: For example: past issues, psychological challenges, or constraints we should consider.

consents.education: I understand this is educational material only. Avenqor does not provide financial advice or trading signals.
consents.terms: I confirm that I have read and accept the Terms & Conditions and Risk & Disclaimer.
consents.termsBefore: I confirm that I have read and accept the

form.delivery: You will receive a confirmation email and the PDF within 48–96 hours.

delivery.description: A senior trader uses your profile to structure a PDF built around your experience, deposit size and risk tolerance. The delay is intentional – this is not an instant template.

points.examples: Examples and scenarios aligned with your markets.
points.checklist: Checklist and simple actions for the next 4–8 weeks.

risk.title: Important risk reminder
risk.description: Custom courses are still education only. They do not remove the risk of trading or guarantee any performance. You remain fully responsible for all decisions and outcomes.

pricing.title: How pricing works
pricing.description: A custom course uses more tokens than a single ready-made PDF. In production, pricing will be defined per market and depth. For now, treat it as a separate product with its own price in tokens and direct payment.

points.tokens: Pay with tokens from your balance.
points.currencies: Or use EUR, GBP, USD or AED at checkout.

ai.title: AI Strategy Builder
ai.description: Get a structured, educational plan with setup description, entry/exit logic, risk framework and a checklist – generated in seconds from your profile.

presets.label: Quick presets
presets.hint: You can still adjust everything below

instruments.label: Instruments you want in the plan

focus.label: Key things to focus on (optional)
focus.placeholder: For example: fewer trades, clear rules, news avoidance...

form.consent: I understand that the generated plan is for educational purposes only and does not contain trading signals or guaranteed results.
form.consentTerms: I confirm that I have read and accept the Terms & Conditions and Risk & Disclaimer.
form.consentTermsBefore: I confirm that I have read and accept the
form.output: The plan will appear below in a structured format and be saved to your library.

output.title: AI strategy output
output.description: Example layout of the generated plan
output.setupDesc: Clear explanation of the pattern or condition you asked for, including time frames and instruments.
output.entryDesc: Rules for when to consider entering and exiting, linked to your risk per trade and max trades per day.
output.riskDesc: Guidance on stop placement, partials and when not to trade (for example around news or low liquidity).
output.checklistDesc: A simple list you can read before each potential trade to avoid emotional decisions.

depth.description: You can request a quick overview or a deeper, more detailed plan. In production, token cost will scale with the depth and complexity you choose.

courses.title: How AI strategies fit with courses
courses.description: Strategies are best used on top of solid understanding. We recommend taking at least one structured course before relying heavily on generated plans.

risk.title: No signals. No guarantees.
risk.description: Even though AI builds a structured plan, markets remain uncertain and high risk. You stay fully responsible for whether, when and how you trade.

auth.required: Please sign in to submit your request
